amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding in the bill by approximately one percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce total appropriations by $272,110,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 82 - 327 (Roll no. 393).
